name: writeDirectoryContents(archiveFrom:path:keySet:selectUsing:flags:threadCount:)
desc: Writes all entries from a directory to the archive stream.
declaration: func writeDirectoryContents(archiveFrom directory: FilePath, path: FilePath? = nil, keySet: ArchiveHeader.FieldKeySet, selectUsing filter: ArchiveHeader.EntryFilter? = nil, flags: ArchiveFlags = [], threadCount: Int = 0) throws
